title: RPG Music Pack Vol 1
description: The perfect pack for RPG, JRPG, adventure, and fantasy games!
longDescription:
Inspired by both classic and modern RPGs, JRPGs, adventure games, platformers and more!

From a composer who's worked on:

www.tabletopmusic.com

Learn Japanese To Survive: Kanji Combat

Primodials: Fireborn

Yandere Simulator


These tracks and others can be previewed here:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JQHe-Kmnvig&list=PL8Ag5lyEH6XMhirQL9iqn8x6Yxe4i5scH

Contains 10 loop-able tracks!
technicalDetails:
Contains 10 loop-able tracks!

1) The Temple Of Hali-de Keywords: Mysterious, Temple, Investigate, Explore, Intriguing

2) Clash of the Forge Keywords: Intense, Dramatic, Metal, Pressure, Boss Battle

3) Gilgame, The Bone King Keywords: Dark, Intense, Battle, Horror, Boss, Skeleton

4) They're Chasing From Above! Keywords: Fast, Chase, Rush, Escape

5) Jungle Temple Tapawei-fi Keywords: Jungle, Ruins, Intriguing, Temple, Explore

6) The Dreary Desert Keywords: Desert, Barren, Wasteland, Sand, Middle Eastern

7) The Dark Town Of Daefell Keywords: Town, Dark, Suspicious, Creepy, Spooky

8) Blades Up! Keywords: Battle, Heroic, Upbeat, Generic JRPG, Victory, Action

9) Of The Dark Keywords: Dungeon, Creepy, Scary, Intense, Horror, Exploring, Evil

10) The King of Oszhova Keywords: Boss Battle, Epic, Orchestral, Percussion, Intense, Dark

Feel free to contact me at alecshea@sonancydesigns.com if you have any questions or would like to inquire about original music!

Technical Details:

Number of music tracks: 10

Does music loop: Yes

Sample rate \ bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit, Stereo, WAVs

Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Minutes of audio provided: 16 minutes 47 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: Any

Supported Target Build Platforms: Any
